Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Interface IEvaluationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EvaluationService
public interface IEvaluationService
Service interface for managing evaluations. Provides methods to add, delete, and retrieve evaluations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Evaluation
    addEvaluation(Evaluation evaluation)
    Adds a new review.

    Deletes a review by its ID.

    getAllEvaluations()
    Retrieves all ratings.
    List<Evaluation>

    Retrieves all evaluations linked to a specific entry.
    List<Evaluation>
    getEvaluationsByRecipe(Long recipeId)
    Retrieves all evaluations linked to a specific recipe.

  • Method Details

    • addEvaluation

      Evaluation addEvaluation(Evaluation evaluation)
      Adds a new review.
      Parameters:
      evaluation - The evaluation to add.
      Returns:
      The evaluation added.

    • deleteEvaluation

      void deleteEvaluation(Long id, boolean isAdmin)
      Deletes a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the assessment to delete.
      isAdmin - Indique si l'utilisateur est administrateur.

    • getAllEvaluations

      List<Evaluation> getAllEvaluations()
      Retrieves all ratings.
      Returns:
      A list of evaluations.

    • getEvaluationsByEntry

      List<Evaluation> getEvaluationsByEntry(Long entryId)
      Retrieves all evaluations linked to a specific entry.
      Parameters:
      entryId - The ID of the entry for which evaluations are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of evaluations associated with the specified entry ID.

    • getEvaluationsByRecipe

      List<Evaluation> getEvaluationsByRecipe(Long recipeId)
      Retrieves all evaluations linked to a specific recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe for which evaluations are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of evaluations associated with the specified recipe ID.
